title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3899/92 of 23 December 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3510/82 fixing the conversion factors applicable to tuna
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION  (EEC) No 3899/92
of 23 December 1992
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3510/82 fixing the conversion  factors applicable to tuna
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3510/82  is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on  1 January 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly  applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1992. For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
ANNEX
